Thu, 06 Jul 2023 02:06:38 GMT https://twitter.com/AiBreakfast/status/1676774625450115072 https://twitter.com/AiBreakfast/status/1676774625450115072 AI Breakfast RT AI Breakfast: We're in a "Don't look up" moment with AI right now. A refined AutoGPT that can click around on the internet, send emails, write file...RT AI Breakfast
我们现在正处于人工智能的“不要抬头”的时刻。

一个可以在互联网上点击、发送电子邮件、写入文件、打电话、谈判、发送/接收资金的精致 AutoGPT 将在今年出现。

它将从根本上改变世界，这一点怎么强调都不为过。; Sat, 22 Apr 2023 23:54:54 GMT https://twitter.com/AiBreakfast/status/1649924771927457792 https://twitter.com/AiBreakfast/status/1649924771927457792AI Breakfast
